the sudo apt-get install pastebinit   just installed a small program that automatically puts things online for others to error check, the second bit ls -lah /var/log   searched your var/log file and the | pastebinit    put whatever ls -lah found onto the web

ok, well he asked for your latest xorg file so you use the command    ls -lrt /var/log     then take a note of the exact name of the last Xorg file noted. then use cat /var/log/<nameOfXorgFile> | pastebinit
